title: Eames Style Office Chair EA108 Mesh White
body: The Mobelaris Eames Office Chair EA108 Mesh was designed in 1958 by Charles Eames and to ensure comfort in the EA108 Mesh Chair, a continuous piece of seat back upholstery has been suspended between Aluminum sides. This famous classic is found in countless homes and living spaces. Like most traditional furniture, office chair had cushions before the EA108 but the release of a lightly padded mesh cover has been a breakthrough in the furniture industry as it adapts the shape of whoever is sitting in it providing comfort without bulk. This chair serves many purpose reason behind the distinction it has received throughout the years.
